channel.title: Co-Owner Help
channel.description:
Hello,
Could someone help me with a Issue i want to know is it possible to add a " Co-Owner " rank with same rights as Owner in Lost-Realm Source.
if you could help me it would be lovely.
Commands.java http://pastebin.com/VXub9PpJ
Player.java http://pastebin.com/G58wBeap

item.title: Co-Owner Help
item.dc:creator: @i_call_dueces i call dueces
item.description:
@i_call_dueces wrote:

it depends on the reason.
if you wanna give him the same set of commands as you, just give him the same playerrights.
if you want him to have the current owner commands, and wanna add some for yourself, then give him owner rights, make a new command method (there is a method for admin commands, supportercommands, mod ommands… which is all then processed through a single method)

basically, if you want him to have the same codes as you, give him the same playerrights.
if you him to have the same codes, but you want to add some only YOU can use, then message me, and ill walk you through it after work

Read full topic

item.title: Co-Owner Help
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

Seeing you want him to have the same rights…can’t you just give him playerRights == 3?

Read full topic
